translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それが気づけば魔人討伐隊の一人として、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And before I knew it, I was fighting as one of the demon extermination squad,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦わされるとか、なんなんですかこれはー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: forced to fight or something, what is this—!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、でも、ランス様のすっげー傍にいられるのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, but being super close to Rance-sama is

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 超嬉しい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: really great."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこで、はたとヌヌハラの動きが止まり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment, Nunuhara suddenly stopped moving,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 視線を正面の一点に向ける。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and fixed her gaze on a single point straight ahead.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あなた……」
「そうそう、そこのあなたよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, yes, you there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今の見てた？　今の見てた？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Did you see that just now? Did you see that just now?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やだもう……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, come on..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見てたなら声をかけてよ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you saw it, then say something..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「というわけで、あなた、久し振りね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So then, you, it's been a while.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヌヌハラ・キャベツよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm Nunuhara Cabbage."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えっ、誰だですって？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eh, you say who?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私とは初対面ですって？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You say this is your first time meeting me?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そういうあなたは、メニューの図鑑から、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then you, from the menu's encyclopedia,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私のお部屋にゴーしてね！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: go to my room, okay!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この世界の常識とかそういうあれこれを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I will kindly, and sometimes not so kindly, teach you all about the common sense and such in this world!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私が優しく、時に優しくなく教えるの！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll gently, and at times not so gently, teach you!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれこれ私と世界のこと語り合いましょうね！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's talk about all sorts of things — me and the world!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「って……言いたいけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I want to say that, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今はそんな元気ないのよね……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't really have the energy right now...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気づけばランス様のこんな近くに……はあ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Before I knew it, I'm this close to Rance-sama... sigh..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうそう！　それが問題なの！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, yes! That's the problem!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聞いて、聞いてよ、あなた！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Listen, listen to me, you!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私、なんでか知らないけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't know why,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城にいるの！　潜入じゃなく！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm in Rance Castle! Not sneaking in!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 仲間の一人として！　何故か！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As one of the comrades! Somehow!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「一応！　死ぬ気で隠れ潜んでランス様からは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sort of! I'm hiding like my life depends on it so Rance-sama doesn't see me,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 姿見られないようにしてるけども！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but still!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私はランス様の冒険には
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I really don't want to get involved

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 出来るだけ絡みたくないのにー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: as much as possible in Rance-sama's adventures!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、でも、やっぱりランス様の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, but after all, being near Rance-sama

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おそばにいられるのすっごく嬉しい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: makes me really happy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ていうかここお城よ、お城。すげー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I mean, this is a castle, a castle. Amazing."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もうその辺を歩くだけで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Just walking around here,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シャッター切る指も軽くなりますわー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: my finger on the shutter gets lighter, you know?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今まで監視映像越しでしか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Until now, I could only see this world through surveillance footage,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見られなかった世界が目の前にあるってんだから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but now the world that I could only watch through those videos is right in front of me,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そりゃ私の興奮も抑えられないってものよねー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so of course I can't control my excitement!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……そうなのよね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...That's right.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今までは監視映像越しのストーキングなのよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Until now, it was just stalking from behind surveillance footage.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあ、実際に現場に赴いて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, there were times I actually went to the scene

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様を覗き見ていたこともあるけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and peeked at Rance-sama,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あくまでもそれは遠くから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but even then, it was always from afar."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私はランス様のストーカーだけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm a stalker of Rance-sama,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも出来る限りランス様と絡みたくないの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but I want to avoid getting involved with him as much as possible."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うーーーーーん……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmmmm..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その感覚を説明するのは難しいけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's hard to explain that feeling, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうねぇ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's see...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「例えば――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For example—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「特定の誰かを死ぬほど好きになった時、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When you come to love a particular someone to death,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 親や周囲の環境全てに感謝する気持ち、分かる？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: do you understand the feeling of gratitude towards your parents and all the environment around?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「貴方達がいたから、彼はここにこうしていて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because you were there, he is here like this,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は彼と出会うことが出来ました……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was able to meet him...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界の全てに感謝、ありがとう……みたいな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: like being thankful to everything in the world, thank you... something like that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私はランス様と出会ったとき、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "When I met Rance-sama,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 雷に打たれたような感覚に陥り……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I felt like I was struck by lightning...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして気づけばこの世界も大好きになったの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and before I knew it, I came to love this world too."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

Rance-sama,"},{"lineNumber":113109,"originalJapaneseLine":"　雷に打たれたような感覚に陥り……","translatedEnglishLine":"I felt like I was struck by lightning..."},{"lineNumber":113110,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そして気づけばこの世界も大好きになったの」","translatedEnglishLine":"and before I knew it, I came to love this world too.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それが気づけば魔人討伐隊の一人として、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And before I knew it, I was fighting as one of the demon extermination squad,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦わされるとか、なんなんですかこれはー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: forced to fight or something, what is this—!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、でも、ランス様のすっげー傍にいられるのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, but being super close to Rance-sama is

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 超嬉しい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: really great."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこで、はたとヌヌハラの動きが止まり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment, Nunuhara suddenly stopped moving,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 視線を正面の一点に向ける。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and fixed her gaze on a single point straight ahead.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あなた……」
「そうそう、そこのあなたよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, yes, you there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今の見てた？　今の見てた？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Did you see that just now? Did you see that just now?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やだもう……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, come on..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見てたなら声をかけてよ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you saw it, then say something..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「というわけで、あなた、久し振りね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So then, you, it's been a while.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヌヌハラ・キャベツよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm Nunuhara Cabbage."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えっ、誰だですって？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eh, you say who?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私とは初対面ですって？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You say this is your first time meeting me?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そういうあなたは、メニューの図鑑から、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then you, from the menu's encyclopedia,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私のお部屋にゴーしてね！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: go to my room, okay!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この世界の常識とかそういうあれこれを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I will kindly, and sometimes not so kindly, teach you all about the common sense and such in this world!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私が優しく、時に優しくなく教えるの！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll gently, and at times not so gently, teach you!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれこれ私と世界のこと語り合いましょうね！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's talk about all sorts of things — me and the world!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「って……言いたいけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I want to say that, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今はそんな元気ないのよね……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't really have the energy right now...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気づけばランス様のこんな近くに……はあ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Before I knew it, I'm this close to Rance-sama... sigh..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうそう！　それが問題なの！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, yes! That's the problem!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聞いて、聞いてよ、あなた！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Listen, listen to me, you!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私、なんでか知らないけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't know why,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城にいるの！　潜入じゃなく！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm in Rance Castle! Not sneaking in!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 仲間の一人として！　何故か！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As one of the comrades! Somehow!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「一応！　死ぬ気で隠れ潜んでランス様からは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sort of! I'm hiding like my life depends on it so Rance-sama doesn't see me,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 姿見られないようにしてるけども！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but still!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私はランス様の冒険には
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I really don't want to get involved

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 出来るだけ絡みたくないのにー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: as much as possible in Rance-sama's adventures!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、でも、やっぱりランス様の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, but after all, being near Rance-sama

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おそばにいられるのすっごく嬉しい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: makes me really happy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ていうかここお城よ、お城。すげー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I mean, this is a castle, a castle. Amazing."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もうその辺を歩くだけで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Just walking around here,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シャッター切る指も軽くなりますわー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: my finger on the shutter gets lighter, you know?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今まで監視映像越しでしか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Until now, I could only see this world through surveillance footage,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見られなかった世界が目の前にあるってんだから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but now the world that I could only watch through those videos is right in front of me,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そりゃ私の興奮も抑えられないってものよねー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so of course I can't control my excitement!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……そうなのよね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...That's right.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今までは監視映像越しのストーキングなのよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Until now, it was just stalking from behind surveillance footage.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあ、実際に現場に赴いて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, there were times I actually went to the scene

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様を覗き見ていたこともあるけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and peeked at Rance-sama,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あくまでもそれは遠くから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but even then, it was always from afar."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私はランス様のストーカーだけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm a stalker of Rance-sama,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも出来る限りランス様と絡みたくないの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but I want to avoid getting involved with him as much as possible."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うーーーーーん……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmmmm..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その感覚を説明するのは難しいけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's hard to explain that feeling, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうねぇ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's see...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「例えば――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For example—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「特定の誰かを死ぬほど好きになった時、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When you come to love a particular someone to death,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 親や周囲の環境全てに感謝する気持ち、分かる？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: do you understand the feeling of gratitude towards your parents and all the environment around?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「貴方達がいたから、彼はここにこうしていて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because you were there, he is here like this,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は彼と出会うことが出来ました……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was able to meet him...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界の全てに感謝、ありがとう……みたいな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: like being thankful to everything in the world, thank you... something like that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私はランス様と出会ったとき、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "When I met Rance-sama,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 雷に打たれたような感覚に陥り……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I felt like I was struck by lightning...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして気づけばこの世界も大好きになったの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and before I knew it, I came to love this world too."
